title: Shyvana interactions with Dragon
body: Seeing how {{champion:82}}  got the Dragon Force ability and the new dragon icon it seems Rito is giving drag some love so i was  wondering if it would be a good idea for {{champion:102}}  to have some sort of interaction with the Dragon and if possible maybe a step up from a special taunt like all the new champions are getting like maybe the Dragon could actually taunt back with its own words as we see that dragons are clearly sentient as hybrids exist in the lore and dragons can recognise ones that are dragon slayers which is the lore reason behind the Dragon Slayer buff and while we're on this topic another dragon themed champion would be cool but bottom line is do you guys think shyvana should have some special interactions with the dragon on summoners rift and should it be a special taunt or something......more?

replies.body: This makes more sense then the Mordekaiser update :)
Wow got nice feedback here atm :D
